text: Pierson Creek is a stream in Woodbury and Cherokee counties, in the US state of Iowa. It is a tributary of the Little Sioux River. The headwaters are at and the confluence with the Little Sioux are at . Pierson Creek was named for Andrew Pierson, a pioneer settler. ==See also== *List of rivers of Iowa ==References== Category:Bodies of water of Cherokee County, Iowa Category:Rivers of Woodbury County, Iowa Category:Rivers of Iowa
title: Pierson Creek
